item.title: The Top Solana Projects: The Best Apps, Dapps, Defi, & NFTs
item.description: Solana is a blockchain designed for decentralized apps (Dapps). This open-source project promises faster operation and cheap transaction fees compared to the Ethereum network. By using proof of work, Solana is an eco-friendly network and has less environmental impact than blockchains like Bitcoin. Recently launched in April 2020, Solana has grown by leaps and bounds. At the time of this article, Solana has jumped from $1.50 in January 2021 to $145.
